'''''The Making of The Lord of the Rings''''' is an 8-page booklet by [[Rayner Unwin]], published in [[August]] [[1992]] by W.A.Meeuws.<ref>[http://www.amazon.co.uk/Making-Lord-Rings-Rayner-Unwin/dp/1854760114 Amazon.co.uk]</ref>

Originally, only 250 copies were made for the Centenary celebrations at Keble College, [[University of Oxford|Oxford]]. 12 copies contained Italian hand-made marble paper covered boards and a linen spine.<ref>[http://www.abebooks.com/servlet/BookDetailsPL?bi=1161006918&searchurl=isbn%3D1854760114%26sts%3Dt%26x%3D0%26y%3D0 Abebooks.com]</ref> In [[2007]], 100 more copies were printed.<ref>[http://www.abebooks.com/servlet/BookDetailsPL?bi=1161006768&isbn=1854760114 Abebooks.com]</ref>
